messages.mail_name: Name must be at least 3 chars long!
messages.mail_message: Message must be at least 3 chars long!
messages.audit_file_version: The audit file loaded belongs to an early version of AITAM. To ensure compatibility, working language will switch automatically to english!
messages.audit_edit_save: Audit saved successfuly! Use Download command under Audit menu to get the file.
messages.audit_sync_preassessment: Sync with A2.02 matrix (02 Understanding the IT-systems) completed!
messages.audit_portfolio_attach: Selected audit was attached to portfolio!

planRiskHeatMatrix.introduction: For a complete picture please use the

planCollectionMatrices.tooltip: Word document containing all matrices included in the audit

findingCreateFinding.tooltip: Opens form of a new finding

findingExecutiveSummary.name: Executive summary
findingExecutiveSummary.tooltip: Generates a Word document containing the Executive Summary

findingExecutiveSummaryRecommendations.name: Executive summary (include recommendations)
findingExecutiveSummaryRecommendations.tooltip: Generates a word processing document containing the Executive Summary with recommendations

recommendationCreateRecommendation.name: Create Recommendation
recommendationCreateRecommendation.tooltip: Opens form of a new recommendation

recommendationTrackReport.name: Track report
recommendationTrackReport.tooltip: Word document containing the audit recommendations track report

reference.auditScope: Audit objectives (ISSAI 100/30, GUID 5100/5.2) and scope (ISSAI 100/48, GUID 5100/5.4)

plugins.pageTitle: Plug-ins available to use in audit

preliminaryActivities.pageTitle: Preliminary Activities and planning (start) the audit

plan.noPlan: No Domains, areas and issues available!

findings.findingFilter: Use hyperlink on ID to visualize/edit the finding

matrix.noplan: No risk assessment done or included in audit! (Save button is disabled)

recommendations.recommendationFilter: Use hyperlink on ID to visualize/edit the audit recommendation
recommendations.selFindingTooltip: Use hyperlink on finding #number to visualize it
recommendations.currentStatus: Current status is collected from last assessment, otherwise the value (not yet accessed) is displayed!

matrix.riskCharacterizationTooltip: (Most relevant category of) Risk faced by organizations directly and indirectly as a result of non-implementation of audit recommendations
matrix.repeated: Repeated in previous audit(s)? (register in remarks field the history)
matrix.timelineTooltip: Timeline planned to implement the action/remedial plan proposed
matrix.outcomeTooltip: Description of the outcome desired by the implementation of the recommendation
matrix.responsibleTooltip: Identify and direct recommendation to those who have responsibility and authority to act on them
matrix.remarksTooltip: (Unstructured) Notes and remarks about recommendation registered by the auditor
matrix.selectFinding: (Select finding in dropdown to get related information!)

treemap.title: Audit Tree Map
treemap.noteDescription: Please consider several elements, such as the images type (act as visual signifiers), branches, colors and keywords, in order to make it easier to structure and recall information:
treemap.legendAudit: The audit and the starting point of an audit tree map
treemap.legendPlanDomain: The selected IT domains in risk table (plan)
treemap.legendPlanArea: The selected IT areas in risk table (plan)
treemap.legendPlanIssue: The selected IT issues in risk table (plan)
treemap.legendRec: The recommendations formulated, in relation with findings
treemap.actionNote: Click on a node to obtain more information.
